ModMetaData.name: Simple Bulk Cooking
ModMetaData.author: Lanilor
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>Simple Bulk Cooking</size>
A simple mod that adds bulk cooking recipes of meals and other food products. Cook meals in bulks of 4 to save time when cooking and carrying ingredients.
No research required. Only a higher cooking skill level than the single meal recipe to balance the increased efficiency.
